column5: does anybody on this board ice fish or for that matter summer fish on this lake.

Sure, was out yesterday (7th/Jan). Best time to go is after 3:00pm for Walleye, 11:00-2:00 for perch. Wife latched onto a 24" wally, I landed a 22" and between us also jigged up some small ones. Slot limit in effect, you must release everything between 18" and 28". Going out again tommorrow.
